Landing_Hero_description: Cultchain is a blockchain based charity which aims to bring transparency and Trust to Charities and NGOs.

DONATE_TRANSPARENTLY_Title: We Bring Trust and Transparency to NGOs

Transparency_Description: Web3 is about transparent world and communication, specially in financial activities.
